ruleArticles:
<js>
var ed_net=String(JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ljun223/reader3@latest/freeok.json"))[0].sourceComment).match(/版本：(.*)/)[1]
var ed_local=String(source.sourceComment).match(/版本：(.*)/)[1];
ed_local!=ed_net?java.longToast("当前订阅源有更新，您可以选择去往源仓库更新也可以继续使用当前版本"):""
var a='class.module-item';

html=java.getElement(a);

	if(result.match("请不要频繁操作")){
		
		java.longToast("搜索时间间隔5秒")
		
		}
		else if(result.match("输入验证码"))
		{
		url=source.sourceUrl+"/so1so/"+source.getVariable()+"-------------.html";
		
		cookie=java.getCookie(url)
			yzm=java.getVerificationCode("https://www.freeok.vip/index.php/verify/index.html?");
			
	var yzmurl="https://www.freeok.vip/index.php/ajax/verify_check?type=search&verify="+yzm+","+JSON.stringify({"method": "POST","cookie":cookie});
	
	msg=java.ajax(yzmurl);
		java.log(msg)
		 url=url+","+JSON.stringify({"cookie":cookie,"referer":url});
		
 data=java.ajax(url);

	java.setContent(data);
	
	html=java.getElement(a);
}  
	html
</js>
ruleContent:
{{@@class.module-tab-item@tag.span@html##span##a}}

{{@xpath://*[@class="module-play-list"]/div##div##ul}} @js: result = result.replace(/([^<]+)<\/span><\/a>/g,'').replace(//g,'')
sortUrl:
搜索::/so1so/{{source.getVariable()}}-------------.html
电影::/vod-show/1-----------.html
剧集::/vod-show/2-----------.html
动漫::/vod-show/3-----------.html
综艺::/vod-show/4-----------.html
短剧::/vod-show/12-----------.html
